### Hotel Accommodations and Meeting Rooms
#### Solicitation Number: 202206246/A
#### Amendment Number: 2
#### Reference Number: PW-23-01020626

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking proposals from hotels to provide accommodations and meeting space for certification training sessions in Jacksonville, Florida, scheduled between April 1, 2023 and March 31, 2024. The training sessions will require approximately 3,132 room nights within a 10-mile radius of 511 North Washington Street, Jacksonville, Florida 32202.

The RCMP will also require use of large and small meeting rooms during these dates.

#### Basis of Selection:
The lowest responsive bid will be selected.

#### Contact Information:
For further information and to submit a bid, visit the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at [www.canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities](http://www.canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities). Bidders are responsible for regularly consulting GETS for the most up-to-date information.

#### Evaluation Criteria and Significant Enquiries:
All proposals will be evaluated based on the requirements outlined in the solicitation. Significant enquiries received and their replies will be posted on GETS.

#### Indigenous Procurement:
The RCMP encourages Indigenous businesses to participate in this solicitation. For more information on the Federal Indigenous Business Directory and eligibility criteria, visit [www.canada.ca/indigenousbusinessdirectory](http://www.canada.ca/indigenousbusinessdirectory).
